tourBios.carHigh: 2015: Turned pro in January, earning his PGA TOUR Latinoamérica card with a solo fifth finish at the Q-School played at in Buenos Aires, Argentina… Had a strong rookie season on PGA TOUR Latinoamérica, making the cut in 14 of 16 starts and collecting five top-10s and eleven top-25s… Had the third lowest scoring average of the season at 70.05, only behind the Order of Merit's top-2 players Rodolfo Cazaubón and Kent Bulle… Finished the year ranked 13th on the Order of Merit… Had three consecutive top-6s in May, finishing solo fourth at the 57th Abierto Mexicano, T6 at the Guatemala Stella Artois Open and T4 at the Honduras Open presented by Indura Beach and Golf Resort… His two other top-10s came on his last two starts of the year, T5 at the Lexus Peru Open and T7 at the PGA TOUR Latinoamérica Tour Championship… Closed the year with a T21 finish at the Web.com Tour Q-School final to earn exempt status thru the second reshuffle of the 2016 season.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Played college golf at Purdue University, 2010-2014…Won the Purdue/Midwest Shootout and the Boilermaker Invitational to claim Big Ten Freshman of the Year honors…Had seven top-10s in 12 events as a junior to be named first-team All-Big Ten…Collected a wire-to-wire victory at the 2013 Indiana Amateur Championship and was named Indiana Golf Association Player of the Year…Named first-team All-Big Ten and Academic All Big Ten after his senior season.
tourBios.personal: Has a sister, Karen…Graduated from Purdue University in 2014 with a degree in management…His father, Scott, is also a Purdue graduate…Affiliated with Crooked Stick GC in Carmel, Indiana, site of the 1991 PGA Championship….Augusta National and Pine Valley are two courses he would love to play…The Indianapolis Colts, Indiana Pacers and St. Louis Cardinals are his favorite pro teams….Tiger Woods is his favorite athlete to watch….His hobbies include Ping-Pong and basketball…His favorite TV show is "Californication." …"The Shawshank Redemption" is his favorite movie…Chicago is his favorite city to visit…Google Maps is his top app…Dream foursome would include his father, his grandfather and Tiger Woods… Twitter/Instagram name is @acschenk1

tourBios.exmtStatus: Exempt - Finished 11-45 at 2015 Web.com Tour Qualifying Tournament (exempt to second reshuffle)

dyn.dynResults: He has finished 4th on the PGA TOUR Latinoameri 2 times.
